name: International Artist Organisation
goal:
The IAO is the umbrella association for national organisations representing the rights and interests of Featured Artists in the Music Industry.

Our principal interests are transparency, the protection of intellectual property and a fair relfection of the value an artist's work generates.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Copyright
Big data
Metadata
Competition
Neighbouring rights
